guidance.title: Empty the queue
guidance.details: Close Phoebus windows/tabs on all connected clients until ioc03-hnoss:CBLOW_Q_USED starts to decrease.

guidance.title: Empty the queue
guidance.details: Close Phoebus windows/tabs on all connected clients until ioc11-gersemi:CBLOW_Q_USED starts to decrease.

guidance.title: Device: 2K Pumps
guidance.details: This is a PLC system connected to WTRVAC PLC in the control room. Check if both PLCs are running normally and a Profibus cable between them is ok. Consult the opi for the cable path.

guidance.title: What to do?
guidance.details: Create a new token. See http://freia.physics.uu.se/Cntrlelog/show.jsp?dir=/2022/12&pos=2022-12-08T11:07:21 Update the time for the next reminder - press "Register service" button in service opi (Cntrl System tab).

guidance.title: Water in Gersemi pit
guidance.details: Check the water levels: Env-CstatV:WtrPuddle:AI0 Env-CstatV:WtrPuddle:AI1 Env-CstatV:WtrPuddle:AI2 and the local indicator. Start the pump.

guidance.title: What to do when INVALID
guidance.details: Usualy it is needed to power cycle the Modbus Gateway: WAVESHARE RS485 TO POE ETH (B) The gateway in FREIA is located in the FREIA compressor room on the wall behind the 2K pumps. For the gateway in Hus3 contact Björn Kuzavas tel. 070-1679246

guidance.title: When MAJOR error
guidance.details: Open Modbus gateway web interface http://192.168.10.38 Select any text entry field and press Enter without changing anything - this will make the gateway to reset and hopefully fix the problem.

pv.name: CstatV-Ctrl:Archiving:On
pv.description: Vertical cryostat's archiving is turned off

guidance.title: What to do?
guidance.details: The communication over the Profibus between wtr_vac PLC 2K_pumps PLC does not work. Remote operation is not possible - use the local panel until the fault is resolved.

display.title: Check the error codes and the status...
